nodes.text: A male individual was the nephew of a smuggler who moved supplies for the Galactic Empire in the Cerberon system during the time after the Battle of Endor. After the smugglers working in the Cerberon system were flushed out by the New Republic's campaign to take the system, the nephew kidnapped New Republic Intelligence agent Caern Adan on the planet Troithe, selling him to an Imperial unit that resided in a hideout on Narthex, the moon of Catadra. While attempting to track Adan down, New Republic pilots Yrica Quell and Nath Tensent questioned Sarvada Dream, who the kidnapper was romantically involved with.
